mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( (select file_name from file where equipment_no=equipment_no) ,'no') AS file_name
mapper.update: UPDATE equipmentManagement SET e_repair_type = CASE WHEN e_repair_type = '구입' THEN '정상' WHEN e_repair_type = '추가구입' THEN '정상' WHEN e_repair_type = '수리' THEN '수리중' ELSE '폐기' END, status = '승인', approval_date = NOW() WHERE equipment_no = #{equipment_no};
mapper.select: select * from equipmentManagement where status='승인' order by equipment_no desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}
select count(equipment_no) from equipmentManagement where status='승인'
select * from equipmentManagement where status='반려' order by equipment_no desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}
select count(equipment_no) from equipmentManagement where status='반려'
